column4: every time i restart my system, fsck fails with: Failed to open the device 'UUID=01445405-7654-45a7-bc23-d767bbfc0147': No such file or directory....anyone know what i can do?
that is a reference to a partition
you should see it in /etc/fstab too, with a comment above it referencing the /dev/foo device entry
yep, and it is working (it mounts fine), it just fails fsck
it should give you a better error as to why it failed
any idea for what i can do/
